title: [Epidemiology] After examining the blood samples from nearly 200 COVID-19 patients, researchers have uncovered underlying metabolic changes that regulate how immune cells react to the disease. These changes are associated with disease severity and could be used to predict patient survival.

[Epidemiology] India's ZyCoV-D is the first DNA vaccine to be approved anywhere in the world. It is administered into the skin without an injection. It has been found to be 67% protective against symptomatic COVID-19 in clinical trials.
